body: this Korean series is a bit long and the ntr is pretty weak. The one getting ntr isn't even the mc but some side characters you won't give much of a shit about. Also the mc, who can listen to other people's thoughts, is kinda like a side character too since most of the time the story focuses on the office girl whoring herself out for a promotion.
and what part of this a ntr?
